en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3
en.description: The Scorpion Evo 3 is a blowback operated carbine manufactured by Česká zbrojovka Uherský Brod, evolved from a Slovak prototype submachine gun developed by Laugo. The A1 variant features a standard left-side non-reciprocating charging handle, although it is ambidextrous and can be switched from side-to-side.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Tron Edition
en.description: The Scorpion Evo 3 is a blowback operated carbine manufactured by Česká zbrojovka Uherský Brod, evolved from a Slovak prototype submachine gun developed by Laugo. The A1 variant features a standard left-side non-reciprocating charging handle, although it is ambidextrous and can be switched from side-to-side. This special edition is dedicated to Tron for helping me in my weapon modding learning curve.

en.name: HB Industries Scorpion Evo 3 9x19 20-round magazine
en.description: A standard 20-round 9x19 magazine for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3 SMG, manufactured by HB Industries.

en.name: HB Industries Scorpion Evo 3 9x19 30-round magazine
en.description: A standard 30-round 9x19 magazine for the CZ Scorpion Evo3 SMG, manufactured by HB Industries.

en.name: F5 MFG Scorpion Evo 3 9x19 50-round Drum Magazine
en.description: A 50-round 9x19 drum magazine for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3 SMG, designed by F5 Manufacturing.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 9x19mm Extended Barrel
en.description: An extended barrel for CZ Scorpion-series weapons chambered in 9x19mm ammunition.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 9x19mm Standard Barrel
en.description: A standard-issue barrel for CZ Scorpion-series weapons chambered in 9x19mm ammunition.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 9x19mm Micro Barrel
en.description: A micro barrel for CZ Scorpion-series weapons chambered in 9x19mm ammunition.

en.name: HB Industries M-LOK 11.5" Handguard
en.description: The HB Industries M-LOK 11.5 inch handguard rail adapter allows you to install additional M-LOK attachments on the CZ Scorpion Evo 3 weapon series.

en.name: HB Industries M-LOK 4.25" Micro Handguard
en.description: The HB Industries M-LOK 4.25 inch micro handguard rail adapter allows you to install additional M-LOK attachments on the CZ Scorpion Evo 3 weapon series.

en.name: HB Industries M-LOK 6.84" Handguard
en.description: The HB Industries M-LOK 6.84 inch handguard rail adapter allows you to install additional M-LOK attachments on the CZ Scorpion Evo 3 weapon series.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Standard-Issue Handguard
en.description: A standard-issue handguard for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3-series weapons.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Buffer Tube Stock Adapter
en.description: A stock adapter, designed for the CZ Scorpion EVO3-series weapons to mount buffer-tube style stocks.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 MCX-Style Skeleton Foldable Stock
en.description: A foldable skeletized stock designed for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3-series weapons.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Standard Folding Stock
en.description: A mixed polymer/metal foldable stock which comes standard with the CZ Scorpion Evo 3-series weapons.

en.name: Yeti Wurks Switchback Pistol Grip
en.description: A polymer pistol grip designed for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3-series weapons, manufactured by Yeti Wurks.

en.name: Magpul CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Pistol Grip
en.description: A polymer pistol grip designed for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3-series weapons, manufactured by Magpul.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Standard-Issue Pistol Grip
en.description: A polymer pistol grip which comes standard-issued with the CZ Scorpion EVO 3-series weapons.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Charging Handle
en.description: A standard-issue charging handle for CZ Scorpion EVO 3 and compatible systems. Manufactured by Česká zbrojovka Uherský Brod.

en.name: Innovative Arms IASC9-K Suppressor
en.description: A sound suppressor for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3, designed by Innovative Arms.

en.name: Innovative Arms IASC9-K Integral Suppressor
en.description: An integral sound suppressor for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3, designed by Innovative Arms to fit inside most Scorpion M-LOK handguards.

en.name: CZScorpion Evo 3 Standard-Issue Flashhider
en.description: A standard-issue flashhider, designed for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Picatinny Rear Sight
en.description: A standard-issue picatinny rear iron sight, designed for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3.

en.name: CZ Scorpion Evo 3 Picatinny Front Sight
en.description: A standard-issue picatinny front iron sight, designed for the CZ Scorpion Evo 3.
